thread.title: ian kerr
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 ian kerr

author: ian kerr
title: ian kerr
text: Goods not delivered,no tracking advice provided, no dispatch notice. I tried to contact via email and although I type in my correct email address the I am told it is incorrect,bloody sham !!! Item was paid for on 14 th January 2017 have not had any confirmation or contact since. Very unhappy with this so called online company
